  (S
    (VP (VB Text)
      (PP (IN by)
        (NP (NNP Holydrummer))
        (, ,)))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (NNS Photos))
      (PP (IN by)
        (NP
          (NP (NNP ieat) (NNP Nestled))
          (PP (IN within)
            (NP (DT the) (NNP Tanjong) (NNP Pagar) (NN enclave))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (JJ chi-chi) (JJ Chinese) (NN restaurant) (NN resplendent))
        (PP (IN with)
          (NP (JJ contemporary) (NN chinoiserie) (NN decor)))))
    (. .)))

    (WHNP (WP who))
    (SQ
      (VP (VBZ seeks)

          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB transform)
              (NP (JJ traditional) (JJ Chinese) (NN cuisine))
              (PP (IN by)
                (S
                  (VP (VBG channelling)

                    (PP (IN into)
                      (NP
                        (NP (NNP crafting) (NNP exquisite))

      (VB Sauce) (-LRB- -LRB-)
